item.title: New Orleans attack latest: Police don't believe any other suspects involved
item.description: The FBI and New Orleans police no longer believe there are any other suspects involved in the New Year's truck attack on Bourbon Street.

item.title: LIVE: Officials give update on deadly attack on New Orleans' Bourbon Street
item.description: 24/7 coverage of breaking news and live events

item.title: Montenegro mourns after gunman kills at least 12 people before shooting himself
item.description: Shock and dismay prevails in Montenegro after a gunman fatally shot 12 people including two children in a western town before killing himself
